text: Data collection is the task of gathering and measuring data (information) in an orderly or systematic way. Researchers follow a formal plan for data collection to ensure that the information they collect has clear definitions, and is accurate. If you do not have clearly defined, accurate information, decisions you make using that information will not have validity. Data Collection and Analysis By Dr. Roger Sapsford, Victor Jupp ==Related pages== * Data management ==References== Category:Knowledge
title: Data collection
